description: It's all about the screen.  With your new iPad, you need to protect the screen from dirty fingerprints, smudges, scrapes and scratches.  Speck's ShieldView precise-fit screen films will help defend your iPad display from potential damage while keeping it clearn and clear!  ShieldView adds an ultra-thin durable layer of tranparent protection to your iPad.  The film stays firmly in place without interfering with touchscreen functions.  Plus, ShieldView is easy to apply, removes cleanly, and without any sticky residue.  Microfiber cleaning cloth included in with the 2-pack of ShieldView screen protectors.
title: Speck Products Apple iPad ShieldView Anti-Glare Protective Screen Films, 2-Pack, IPAD-SHVW-A025MT
